mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, U.USER_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_LIST_NO, B.BOARD_REGISTER, B.BOARD_MODIFY FROM BOARD B JOIN USER_T U ON(B.WRITER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND U.USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_LIST_NO, U.USER_NO, R.REPLY_NO AS R_REPLY_NO, R.BOARD_NO AS R_BOARD_NO, R.REPLY_CONTENT AS R_REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_REGISTER AS R_REPLY_REGISTER, R.REPLY_MODIFY AS R_REPLY_MODIFY FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO) JOIN USER_T U ON(R.WRITER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND U.USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY R.REPLY_NO DESC
